Faker: Im using VLC to, this player doesn't use any kind of vobsub or codecs or other unnecessary sh:t. You must name the files excactly with the same name (not the file ending of course) and only use small letters, then start the movie file after that, then in the program on the top menu go to: video/subtitles/track1, this should work I hope. Good Luck
